int metal_anlogic_irq_init ( void  )

metal_anlogic_irq_int

Anlogic interrupt controller initialization. It will initialize the metal Anlogic IRQ controller data structure.

Returns
0 for success, or negative value for failure

void metal_anlogic_irq_isr ( void *  arg)

metal_anlogic_irq_isr

Anlogic interrupt ISR can be registered to the Anlogic embeddedsw IRQ controller driver.

Parameters
[in]arginput argument, interrupt vector id.
